answers.answer: If your baby comes at 5 lb (which isn't gauranteed, weight can be off by 3lb) then the baby will probably spend time in the NICU but will most likely be ok.
Your baby will be fine. Dont think bad thoughts only good :) god is good all the time

does this mean if weight can be off by 5lb that he could be majorly smaller?? i was really poorly through my 1st 2 trimesters and now i just feel constantly wound up and anxious surely that doesnt help?
No. I'm saying they're not always accurate, they are rarely spot on is what my doctor told me. They said my baby would be 4lb at birth. He was 6lb 12oz.

I also had my baby at 36 weeks so he wasn't even fully term. They have so many medical advances now there have been babies even smaller than that, that have survived and grow to be very healthy babies. When I myself was born I was 3lb 2 oz. I was so small. Here I am today 20 years old and very healthy! Keep positive thoughts.

I hope everything works out for you. I also jave been monitored since 22 weeks for growth. He was very behind they thought he had stopped growing, had two more ultrasounds after with no change. It was devastating to hear but thankfully at my 28 week ultrasound he finally caught up!! Hes still behimd a bit hut hes growing hes now in the 19th percentile. The docs will only do what they feel is best dont be too stressed.

I wouldn't stress to much if I were you! My daughter had a severe growth restriction & was born at 32 weeks due to preeclampsia/Hellp syndrome. She was 2 lbs 14oz. Now she is a bright super active 22 month old!! Good luck on the rest of your pregnancy!!

question: im 35 weeks pregnant and ive been havin growth scans since i was 28 weeks my baby is measuring below the 10th centile and weighs 4oz under the weight my consultant wants him to be. shes considering inducing me at the end of the week if baby isnt 5lbs is this safe? or am i going to lose him :( it took me and my partner months to concieve as i have major reproduction problems i dont want our little miracle to be taken away im so scared please help!
title: growth scans help!!
